name: get_endpoint_data
description: Fetch a snapshot file; optionally return keys-only or a paginated slice of a top-level array.

name.description: Endpoint name (e.g., losses, revenge, excessive-risk / risk-sizing / winrate-payoff / stop-loss). Hyphens/underscores/spaces are equivalent.

keys_only.description: If true, return only top-level keys and array lengths.

top.description: Name of a top-level array to page through (e.g., 'trades', 'records').

fields.description: Projection of fields to return for items in the paginated array (used with 'top').

include_total.description: When paginating a top-level array, include `total` = full count.

max_results.description: Number of items to return from the top-level array; 0 = return only the total.
